external_games.name: Pinball FX2: Civil War Table DLC

name: Pinball FX2: Civil War Table DLC
summary: The controversy over the Superhuman Registration Act has led to the unfathomable Super Hero Civil War. Choose between Iron Man, who leads the SRA's supporters, and Captain America, who sees it as a threat to personal liberties, as you assemble your team and experience one of the most dramatic conflicts in the Marvel Universe.
